resources.string: Thank you for upgrading to premium!

I Love is an awesome application natively coded in Kotlin. At the beginning, the goal was to draw a beautiful heart.\nThen, the idea to create a simple game with little hearts came.\nFind the easter eggs by touching everywhere ;)
Feedback on the I Love app.
Be part of the adventure with I Love app in Beta: https://www.chillcoding.com/app/ilove/
The Application need permissions to remember you on other devices.
Cannot update top scores because of internet connection.
Cannot have latest top scores, try later :)

string-array.name: text_love
string-array.item:
THE ONLY WAY
TO DO
GREAT WORK
IS TO
LOVE
WHAT YOU DO.

WE FALL IN
LOVE
BY CHANCE
WE STAY IN
LOVE
BY CHOICE.

YOU KNOW
YOU ARE IN
LOVE
WHEN YOU CAN'T
FALL ASLEEP
BECAUSE REALITY
IS FINALLY
BETTER THAN YOUR
DREAMS.

string-array.name: text_award
string-array.item:
"Congratulation!

" "You won the 'I Love' award, it's the first of a long set.
" "Note: The followings awards are only available with premium purchase.
" "To win award you have to touch as mush as possible hearts.

" "'I Love' start with an exceptional heart, as you have certainly noticed only its size, its color and its speed change. The shape is always the same, in this way it is unique.

" "I ❤️ is the global symbol for souvenirs of every place.
 I ❤️ SF
 I ❤️ LA
 I ❤️ BCN
 I ❤ Martinique
 I ❤ Cannes

" "By the way, the story of 'I Love' start at Cannes.
6:08 AM darkness had not long surrendered to the light. While the sun rise, the thin clouds are cast over the sky, taking sequentially the most beautiful colors of a rainbow, from purple to yellow. The sea was tainted; no longer an abyss of black. Instead it looked a metallic blue. Any words can explain the feeling of a sunrise, it goes without saying that fortunately everyone can live these stolen moment.Last, but not least under the sun we are all the same."
